types:type.name: noteJson
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type noteJson = Array<{| ID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, Title: String, Content: String, CreatedAt: String, UpdatedAt: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"ID\\\":1,\\\"Title\\\":\\\"This is my first note\\\",\\\"Content\\\":\\\"Be happy\\\",\\\"CreatedAt\\\":\\\"2021-01-05\\\",\\\"UpdatedAt\\\":\\\"2021-01-05\\\"},{\\\"ID\\\":2,\\\"Title\\\":\\\"This is my second note\\\",\\\"Content\\\":\\\"Salesforce\\\",\\\"CreatedAt\\\":\\\"2021-01-06\\\",\\\"UpdatedAt\\\":\\\"2021-01-05\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: noteCSV
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type noteCSV = Array<{| ID: Number, Title: String, Content: String, CreatedAt: Date, UpdatedAt: Date|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}
